message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I believe it will be a great asset for you.  My starting price is $11,500.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $10,000 is a bit lower than I hoped,  I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's try $10,750. This price still allows me to make a profit while ensuring you get a fair price for this valuable product.
